00058 class DHTransform {
00059 
00061   vec3 dtrans;
00062 
00064   vec3 atrans;
00065 
00067   transf tr4TimesTr3;
00068 
00070   transf tr2;
00071 
00073   transf tr1;
00074 
00076   transf tran;
00077 
00079   double theta;
00080 
00082   double d;
00083 
00085   double a;
00086 
00088   double alpha;
00089 
00090 public:
00091   DHTransform(double thval=0.0,double dval=0.0,double aval=0.0,
00092               double alval=0.0);
00093   DHTransform( const DHTransform *d ){
00094           memcpy( this, d, sizeof(DHTransform));
00095   }
00096 
00098   double getD() const {return d;}
00099 
00101   double getTheta() const {return theta;}
00102 
00104   const transf& getTran() const {return tran;}
00105   
00111   transf getTran(double thetaVal,double dVal) const
00112     {
00113       return tr4TimesTr3 * translate_transf(vec3(0,0,dVal)) * 
00114         rotate_transf(thetaVal,vec3(0,0,1));
00115     }
00116 
00117   void setD(double q);
00118   void setTheta(double q);
00119 };

00132 class Joint {
00133 protected:
00135   int DOFnum;
00136 
00138   KinematicChain *owner;
00139 
00141   int jointNum;
00142 
00144   bool draggerAttached;
00145 
00147   double dynamicsVal;
00148 
00150   double velocity;
00151 
00153   double minVal,maxVal;

00156   double mCouplingRatio;  
00157 
00159   double c;  
00160 
00162   double f1;
00163 
00165   double f0;
00166 
00168   double mK;
00169 
00171   double mRestVal;
00172 
00174   vec3 worldAxis;
00175 
00177   DHTransform *DH;
00178 
00180   SoTransform *IVTran;
00181 
00182 public:
00184   DynJoint *dynJoint;
00185 
00188  Joint(KinematicChain *k) : DOFnum(0), owner(k), jointNum(-1), draggerAttached(false), dynamicsVal(0.0),
00189     velocity(0.0),minVal(0.0),maxVal(0.0),mCouplingRatio(1.0),c(0.0),f1(0.0),f0(0.0),mK(0.0),
00190         mRestVal(0.0), DH(NULL),
00191     IVTran(NULL), dynJoint(NULL) {IVTran = new SoTransform(); IVTran->ref();}
00192 
00193   virtual ~Joint();
00194 
00198   virtual int initJointFromXml(const TiXmlElement* root, int jnum) =0;
00199 
00201   void cloneFrom(const Joint *original);
00202 
00204   virtual int setVal(double q)=0;
00205 
00207   virtual void applyInternalWrench(double magnitude)=0;
00208 
00210   virtual void applyPassiveInternalWrenches();
00211  
00213   void setVelocity(double v) {velocity = v;}
00214 
00216   void setDynamicsVal(double v) {dynamicsVal = v;}
00217 
00220   void setWorldAxis(const vec3 &wa) {worldAxis = normalise(wa);}
00221 
00223   void setDraggerAttached(bool b) {draggerAttached = b;}
00224 
00225   //Accessors:
00226 
00228   int getNum() const {return jointNum;}
00229 
00231   int getChainNum() const;
00232 
00234   virtual double getVal() const =0;
00235 
00237   virtual JointT getType() const =0;
00238 
00241   virtual transf getTran(double jointVal) const =0;
00242 
00245   virtual transf getDynamicsTran() const =0;
00246 
00248   int getDOFNum() const {return DOFnum;}
00249 
00251   double getCouplingRatio() const {return mCouplingRatio;}
00252 
00254   double getSpringStiffness() {return mK;}
00255 
00257   double getOffset() const {return c;}
00258 
00260   double getMin() const {return minVal;}
00261 
00263   double getMax() const {return maxVal;}
00264 
00266   double getVelocity() const {return velocity;}
00267 
00271   double getFriction() const {
00272     return -f1 * velocity + (velocity<0 ? f0 : (velocity>0 ? -f0 : 0.0));
00273   }
00274 
00277   double getSpringForce() const;
00278 
00281   double getDynamicsVal() const {return dynamicsVal;}
00282 
00284   transf const& getTran() const {return DH->getTran();}
00285

00298                                                  const transf &toTarget, bool worldCoords);

00306 class PrismaticJoint : public Joint {
00307 
00308 public:
00309 
00311   PrismaticJoint(KinematicChain *k) : Joint(k) {}
00312 
00313   virtual int initJointFromXml(const TiXmlElement* root, int jnum);
00314   
00315   virtual void applyInternalWrench(double magnitude);
00316 
00317   virtual int setVal(double q);
00318 
00320   virtual double getVal() const {return DH->getD() - c;}
00321 
00323   virtual JointT getType() const {return PRISMATIC;}
00324 
00325   transf getTran(double jointVal) const {
00326     return DH->getTran(DH->getTheta(),jointVal + c);
00327   }
00328 
00329   transf getDynamicsTran() const {
00330     return DH->getTran(DH->getTheta(),dynamicsVal);
00331   }
00332 
00333 };
00334

00339 class RevoluteJoint : public Joint {
00340 
00341 public:
00342 
00344   RevoluteJoint(KinematicChain *k) : Joint(k) {}
00345 
00346   virtual int initJointFromXml(const TiXmlElement* root, int jnum);
00347 
00349   virtual double getVal() const {return DH->getTheta() - c;}
00350 
00351   virtual void applyInternalWrench(double magnitude);
00352 
00353   virtual int setVal(double q);
00354 
00356   virtual JointT getType() const {return REVOLUTE;}
00357 
00358 
00359   transf getTran(double jointVal) const {
00360     return DH->getTran(jointVal + c,DH->getD());
00361   }
00362   transf getDynamicsTran() const {
00363     return DH->getTran(dynamicsVal,DH->getD());
00364   }
00365 
00366 };
